full_text: The 18-year-old pianist from South Korea has a fearsome work ethic: his usual practice routine stretches from around 1pm until the following dawn https://t.co/wTEHsnsQbx

这位来自韩国的18岁钢琴家有着令人生畏的工作态度：他通常的练习时间从下午1点左右一直延续到第二天的黎明https://t.co/wTEHsnsQbx。
